recipe_name: Cream of broccoli and Stilton soup
author: Brian Turner
method: Heat the oil in a frying pan, then add the onion and garlic and fry until softened. Add the broccoli and the stock and simmer for 8-10 minutes. Add the Stilton and season, to taste, with salt and freshly ground black pepper. Allow to cool slightly, then transfer to a food processor and blend until smooth. To serve, pour into a warm bowl.
ingredients: 1 tbsp olive oil,  ½ onion, chopped,  1 garlic clove, chopped,  100g/3½oz broccoli florets, blanched,  150ml/4½fl oz hot vegetable stock,  50g/1½oz Stilton,  salt and freshly ground black pepper
